title: Science Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Using Digital Game-Based Learning (DGBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theories in scientific fields and foundational research methodologies
context.additional_context: Students participate in game-based projects using digital devices and are evaluated on their final performance through summative assessments

learning_goals: Students analyze and design game mechanics that evoke Attention, Relevance, and Confidence (ARC) in a DGBL environment.
Learners improve their ability to design iterative learning processes by reflecting on performance evaluation (Satisfaction) after completing game-based tasks.
Participants complete a scientific case study to understand the interaction between motivational elements and performance outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
